item.title: 沃尔玛支持的 Ibotta 在 5.77 亿美元首次公开募股后股价大涨 34
item.description: 数字营销软件公司 Ibotta Inc. 和一群股东在首次公开募股中筹集了约 5.773 亿美元，发行价高于市场定价范围，此后该公司股价攀升达 34%。【原文：Ibotta Inc. shares climbed as much as 34% after the digital marketing software firm and a group of shareholders raised about $577.3 million in an initial public offering priced above a marketed range.】

item.title: Ardian 即将达成收购 BCI 超过 10 亿美元私募股权的交易
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，法国收购公司 Ardian SAS 接近达成一项交易，从不列颠哥伦比亚投资管理公司（British Columbia Investment Management Corp.【原文：French buyout firm Ardian SAS is close to a deal to acquire more than $1 billion of private equity fund stakes from British Columbia Investment Management Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 图书馆服务公司酝酿合并，寻求私人债务交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，图书馆服务公司 Baker & Taylor 与 Media Source Inc.【原文：Library services companies Baker & Taylor and Media Source Inc. have held talks to combine and have approached direct lenders about financing for the potential deal, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 曾估值 120 亿美元的快递公司 Getir 考虑出售和退出市场
item.description: Getir 曾经是外卖初创企业界的宠儿，估值 120 亿美元，由于面临投资者要求减少损失的压力，它正在权衡资产出售和退出非核心市场的可能性。【原文：Getir, once a darling of the delivery startup world valued at $12 billion, is weighing asset sales and potential exits from non-core markets as it faces pressure from investors to cut its losses.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称沙特阿拉伯需要接近 100 美元的油价
item.description: 据国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）称，由于 "欧佩克+"（OPEC+）领导人带头减产，沙特阿拉伯今年需要的油价将高于此前的预期。【原文：Saudi Arabia will need a higher oil price than previously thought this year as the OPEC+ leader spearheads the group’s production cuts, according to the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 吉利将出售 13.2 亿美元沃尔沃卡车股票
item.description: 中国浙江吉利控股集团正在出售其在卡车制造商沃尔沃公司（Volvo AB）的全部 B 类股票，这些股票在斯德哥尔摩收盘时价值 144.6 亿瑞典克朗（约合 13.2 亿美元）。【原文：China’s Zhejiang Geely Holding Group is selling the entirety of its Class B shares in truckmaker Volvo AB that were worth 14.46 billion Swedish krona ($1.32 billion) at the close of trading in Stockholm.】

item.title: 阿根廷中央银行行长包斯利即将访华
item.description: 阿根廷中央银行行长圣地亚哥-包西利（Santiago Bausili）计划在未来几周作为一个大型代表团的成员访问中国。【原文：Argentine Central Bank President Santiago Bausili is scheduled to travel to China as part of a large delegation in the coming weeks, according to a person with direct knowledge of the trip who asked not to be named discussing sensitive matters.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司推迟原定于周五进行的业务计划更新
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water Utilities Ltd）推迟了原定于周五进行的业务计划更新。【原文：Thames Water Utilities Ltd has postponed an update to its business plan originally scheduled for Friday, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧莱雅业绩反弹，欧洲和北美市场抵消了中国市场的疲软
item.description: 欧莱雅公司（L'Oreal SA）公布的第一季度销售额好于预期，原因是欧洲和北美市场的强劲表现帮助抵消了中国消费者需求的放缓。【原文：L’Oreal SA reported better-than-expected first-quarter sales as strength in Europe and North America helped offset a slowdown in Chinese consumer demand.】

item.title: 南非央行行长卡尼亚戈称新任期将使央行不受大选周期影响
item.description: 南非储备银行行长莱塞特贾-克甘亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）表示，下个月的大选将解决南非政治前景的不确定性，而关于大选对央行意味着什么的问题已经有了答案。【原文：South African Reserve Bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago said uncertainty about the country’s political outlook will be resolved by next month’s election, while questions on what it means for the central bank have already been answered.】

item.title: Centuri 首次公开募股融资 3.15 亿美元，伊坎交易后上涨 13
item.description: Centuri Holdings Inc. 在首次公开募股和同时进行的私募定价达到市场定价范围的最高点后，股价最高攀升了 13%。【原文：Centuri Holdings Inc. shares climbed as much as 13% after an initial public offering and concurrent private placement priced at the top of a marketed range.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率飙升至 11 月以来最高点，达到 7.1
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率今年首次突破 7%。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US climbed past 7% for the first time this year.】

item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is marketing investment-grade bonds, just two days after issuing perpetual notes, as the bank taps investors following its surprisingly strong first-quarter results.】

item.title: 英国央行行长梅根-格林称英国降息 "并非迫在眉睫
item.description: 英国央行决策者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）表示，由于基本通胀率居高不下且经济增长疲软，英国在是否降息的问题上面临着艰难的权衡。【原文：Bank of England policymaker Megan Greene said the UK faces difficult trade-offs over whether to cut interest rates because underlying inflation remains high and growth is weak.】

item.title: 布雷万-霍华德（Brevan Howard）削减成本，裁员 100 多人
item.description: 作为全球最知名的对冲基金巨头之一，布雷万-霍华德资产管理公司正在裁员 10%，即大约 100 名员工，以降低成本。【原文：Brevan Howard Asset Management is cutting 10% of its workforce — or about 100 employees — to reduce costs as one of the world’s best known hedge fund giants streamlines its rapidly-growing operation.】

item.title: 堡垒公司支持的 Brightline 要求投资者为佛罗里达铁路下注
item.description: Brightline是一个多世纪以来美国第一条新的私营客运铁路，它打赌可以吸引更多的佛罗里达人离开汽车—；但首先，它要对大约40亿美元的债务进行再融资。【原文：Brightline, the first new US private passenger railroad in more than a century, is betting it can lure more Floridians out of their cars — but first, it is refinancing roughly $4 billion in debt.】

item.title: 英国央行行长哈斯凯尔称英国在人工智能竞赛中落后于美国
item.description: 英国央行决策者乔纳森-哈斯凯尔（Jonathan Haskel）表示，美国在人工智能投资方面领先于英国，这引发了人们对生产力差距扩大的担忧。【原文：The US is leading the UK on AI investments, raising concerns about a widening productivity gap, according to Bank of England policymaker Jonathan Haskel.】

item.title: 威廉姆斯仅提及美联储加息，债券即暴跌
item.description: 周四，一位美联储官员仅仅提到了加息的可能性，就打断了美国债券市场从年内最高收益率水平上的复苏。【原文：The US bond market’s recovery from the year’s highest yield levels was cut short Thursday by a Federal Reserve official’s mere mention of the possibility of an interest-rate increase.】

item.title: 高盛华德隆就美国债务对市场的冲击发出警报
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.总裁约翰-沃尔德伦（John Waldron）警告说，一旦发生政治危机，失控的支出可能使美国面临严重风险。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. President John Waldron warned that out-of-control spending could expose the US to serious risk in the event of a political crisis.】

item.title: 苏格兰在 "遥不可及 "的 2030 年气候变化目标上有所退缩
item.description: 苏格兰政府取消了到 2030 年将碳排放量减少 75% 的计划，承认这一目标无法实现，需要重新调整应对气候变化的方法。【原文：The Scottish government scrapped a plan to cut carbon emissions by 75% by 2030, conceding the target is unachievable and that it needs to recalibrate its approach to tackling climate change.】

item.title: 法国可能阻止制药商 Biogaran 向外国公司出售产品
item.description: 法国工业部长罗兰-莱斯库尔（Roland Lescure）表示，法国政府可能会阻止一家外国公司收购仿制药生产商 Biogaran。【原文：The French government might block a foreign company from buying generic-drug maker Biogaran, Industry Minister Roland Lescure said.】

item.title: 霍尔茨曼称美联储不愿降息将限制欧洲央行的回旋余地
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）表示，如果美国通胀率持续走高迫使美联储推迟今年的货币政策宽松政策，那么欧洲中央银行的回旋余地将受到限制。【原文：The European Central Bank’s room for maneuver will be limited if sticky US inflation forces the Federal Reserve to delay monetary policy easing this year, according to Governing Council Member Robert Holzmann.】

item.title: 尼日利亚丹格特炼油厂利用美国原油提高产量
item.description: 尼日利亚新的大型丹格特炼油厂正在缓慢地运转，分析师和交易商密切关注着炼油厂的生产进度，试图了解炼油厂何时开始向市场注入汽油。【原文：Nigeria’s new mega Dangote oil refinery is slowly grinding into gear, with analysts and traders watching its ramp up closely to try to understand when it will start pouring gasoline into the market.】

item.title: 英国大臣抨击金融监管机构的多元化建议
item.description: 英国商务大臣凯米-巴德诺克（Kemi Badenoch）批评了英国监管机构强制金融公司公布其员工数据（包括性别和种族）的计划，警告称这些措施可能会提高成本并抑制经济增长。【原文：UK Business Secretary Kemi Badenoch has criticized plans by the nation’s regulators to force financial firms to publish data about their staff including gender and ethnicity, warning the measures could raise costs and stifle growth.】

item.title: 考文垂接近达成以 7.8 亿英镑收购英国 Co-Op 银行的协议
item.description: 考文垂建筑协会已同意支付 7.8 亿英镑（9.71 亿美元）收购合作银行，这是英国贷款机构整合的最新迹象。【原文：Coventry Building Society has agreed to pay £780 million ($971 million) for Co-Operative Bank, the latest sign of consolidation among British lenders.】

item.title: Azul 正与戈尔股东就股票交易进行谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Azul SA 公司与 Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA 公司合并的势头有所增强，目前正在与这家巴西竞争对手航空公司的控股股东进行交易谈判。【原文：Azul SA’s pursuit of a merger with Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA has gained momentum, with talks underway for a deal with the controlling shareholder of the rival Brazilian airline, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织最新消息：格奥尔基耶娃称美元走强引发担忧
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）表示，美元走强引发了一些经济体的担忧，大家都在关注美国以及美联储何时能够降低利率。【原文：International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva said that the dollar’s strength has prompted concerns among a number of economies, with all eyes on the US and when the Federal Reserve will be able to lower interest rates.】
